disease.name: Andorian Ice Plague
disease.classification: Type: Cryogenic pathogen Risk Level: Severe Quarantine Status: Level 3
disease.transmission: - Primary vector: Ice crystal spores - Secondary: Direct skin contact - Incubation: 2-5 days
disease.symptoms: - Progressive skin crystallization - Internal organ freezing - Antennae necrosis - Hypothermic shock
disease.treatments: - Thermal restructuring therapy - Anti-crystallization serums - Organ warming procedures
disease.complications: - Permanent tissue damage - Antennae sensitivity loss - Chronic temperature regulation issues

disease.name: Vulcan Neural Cascade
disease.classification: Type: Neurological disorder Risk Level: Critical Quarantine Status: Level 2
disease.transmission: - Primary vector: Mind meld contamination - Secondary: Neural interface malfunction - Incubation: Immediate to 24 hours
disease.symptoms: - Logic center disruption - Emotional control loss - Telepathic ability degradation - Memory fragmentation
disease.treatments: - Neural pathway reconstruction - Meditation therapy - Katra stabilization
disease.complications: - Permanent emotional control loss - Telepathic ability damage - Personality fragmentation

disease.name: Klingon Blood Fury
disease.classification: Type: Genetic mutation Risk Level: Extreme Quarantine Status: Level 4
disease.transmission: - Primary vector: Blood contact during battle - Secondary: Genetic activation - Incubation: 3-7 days
disease.symptoms: - Uncontrollable rage - Enhanced strength - Cellular degradation - Honor system malfunction
disease.treatments: - Genetic stabilization - Warrior meditation - Blood screening
disease.complications: - Permanent aggression increase - Organ system failure - Death in battle frenzy

disease.name: Ferengi Profit Fever

disease.transmission: - Primary vector: Corrupted latinum exposure - Secondary: Financial data streams - Incubation: 1-3 business days
disease.symptoms: - Uncontrollable trading compulsion - Lobe inflammation - Profit calculation inability - Irrational business decisions
disease.treatments: - Lobe massage therapy - Rules of Acquisition recitation - Financial detoxification
disease.complications: - Chronic business anxiety - Permanent lobe sensitivity - Bankruptcy risk

disease.name: Romulan Shadow Virus

disease.treatments: - Phase stabilization therapy - Anti-cloaking radiation - Molecular realignment
disease.complications: - Permanent phase variance - Organ system desynchronization - Random cloaking episodes

disease.name: Trill Symbiont Rejection

disease.complications: - Chronic argument addiction - Social relationship strain - Diplomatic career impact
